author: kou
msg: Improve memory management of the Ruby bindings. Destroy pool each function
Rename from destroy for easy to wrap Svn::Core::Pool#destroy.
(Svn::Util.filename_to_temp_file): New method to avoid a GC related problem.
Svn::Delta::Editor#apply_textdelta): Use arguments order changed wrapper
function to avoid a GC related problem.
(Svn::Wc::AdmAccess#translated_file): Pass pool manually to avoid a GC
related problem. This method only exists for backward compatibility.
A GC related problem before this changes still exist.
Tempfile instead of filename to avoid a GC related problem.
(svn_swig_rb_set_pool): Return TRUE if pool is set.
(rb_set_pool_if_swig_type_object): Return TRUE if pool is set.
(%typemap(argout) apr_pool_t *pool): Destroy a pool if the pool is no more
to change order of arguments. The Ruby bindings requires that pool is the

author: nori
msg: * subversion/po/ja.po: Correct a strange translation found in my own
Now ja.po has 1533 translated messages against r23233 (Emacs PO-mode

author: lundblad
msg: * subversion/libsvn_subr/win32_crashrpt.h: Add missing newline at end of file.

author: nikclayton
msg: Adjust propget() and update() to add named and optional parameter support.
(propget, update) Remove from the list of general methods and add to the
list of methods that take named params. Provide a Params::Validate
parameter specification. Adjust the documentation accordingly.
* t/3client.t: Add tests that verify that the methods work with named
params, and that optional parameters are filled out correctly.

author: nikclayton
msg: Adjust the documentation structure for all the SVN::Client methods.
* Client.pm: Don't list methods as items in a list.  Instead, give each
method it's own '=head2' section.  Most POD -> HTML converters will then
automatically include them in the ToC.
(log3, log2, log, ls, revprop_get, revprop_list): List the bare
method name, do not include the "$ctx->" -- it clutters up the ToC,
and is duplicated by the sample code that immediately follows the header.
The remaining methods will be cleared up in the same way as they are
